introText: Welcome to Astrolábio, your digital guide for a perfect stay. Explore our services, schedules, and facilities quickly and intuitively. We are here to make your experience unforgettable.

checkin.title: Check-in & Check-out
checkin.note1: Early check-in subject to availability and may include additional costs.
checkin.note2: Late check-out until 04:00 PM will be charged half the current daily rate. After 04:00 PM, a full daily rate will be charged, allowing stay until noon the next day. Subject to availability.

policies.title: Hotel Policies
policies.safeP1: For the safety of belongings, Swan Novo Hamburgo provides an individual safe in each hotel unit (UH) at no extra cost for storing money, jewelry, documents, and other valuable items. We recommend that guests always use the safe in their unit.
policies.safeP2: The safe is located inside the wardrobe. To get the key, please ask at the reception desk (Ext. 9).
policies.safeP3: If an item does not fit in the safe, storage can be requested from management in a special safe, upon protocol of receipt and description of the item(s) delivered to the hotel.
policies.safeP4: The hotel is not responsible for loss, misplacement, damage, or any occurrences related to items not properly stored in the provided safe or handed over to management.
policies.safeP5: In case of forgetting the password and/or losing the key, the safe can be opened exclusively by management during business hours, with registration and possible charges for costs.
policies.safeP6: For safes with a physical key, opening will require calling a specialized locksmith, subject to service charges.
policies.minorsP1: According to the Child and Adolescent Statute (Law 8.069/90, Art. 82), it is prohibited to accommodate a child or adolescent in a hotel, unless authorized or accompanied by parents (together) or legal guardian, or if carrying a permit from the Juvenile Court with authorization from the absent parent(s).
policies.minorsP2: At check-in, it is mandatory to present the original identification document in the presence of parents or written authorization when accompanied by a duly identified guardian.
policies.petLi1: We have a pet fee of R$ 70.00/day.
policies.petLi2: One pet is allowed per apartment.
policies.petLi3: It is mandatory to present the pet's up-to-date vaccination card at check-in.
policies.petLi4: Apartment cleaning must be scheduled, and linens cannot be used by the pet.
policies.petLi5: The Guardian is responsible for cleaning up waste, maintaining silence, and for any damage caused by the animal.
policies.petLi6: The pet is not allowed to stay in the apartment without the guardian for long periods (more than 4 hours).
policies.petLi7: When circulating in social areas, the pet must be on a leash/lap/carrier. Stay is restricted to the apartment (away from food, pool, and gym areas).
policies.petLi8: Cleaning will not be performed if the pet is alone in the apartment.
policies.guestsP1: Registering guests at the reception is mandatory for security reasons. The overnight fee will be charged at the visitor's check-in. In social areas, registration is not necessary.
policies.rulesP1:
<1>Non-Smoking:
It is strictly forbidden to smoke cigarettes or any derivatives inside the rooms. If this rule is not respected, a cleaning fee of R$ 250.00 will be charged.
policies.rulesP2:
<1>Use of Linens:
Improper use of linens, furniture, or utensils may incur additional costs. If items show excessive dirt or damage, a proportional amount will be charged.
policies.rulesP3:
<1>Loss of Key:
In case of loss or misplacement of the key, a fee of R$ 120.00 will be charged.
